thread.title: BRIEF-Reg-Photocure Announces U.S. FDA Approval Of New Indications For Blue Light Cystoscopy With Cysview

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Reg-Photocure Announces U.S. FDA Approval Of New Indications For Blue Light Cystoscopy With Cysview
text:
Feb 16 (Reuters) - PHOTOCURE ASA:
* REG-PHOTOCURE ANNOUNCES U.S. FDA APPROVAL OF NEW INDICATIONS FOR BLUE LIGHT CYSTOSCOPY WITH CYSVIEW®
* PHOTOCURE ASA- ‍IN COLLABORATION WITH KARL STORZ ENDOSCOPY-AMERICA, INC., PHOTOCURE PLANS TO LAUNCH CYSVIEW IN COMBINATION WITH BLUE LIGHT ENABLED FLEXIBLE VIDEO CYSTOSCOPY IN MID-2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
